column1: Kata Robata////Seriously may be my go to sushi spot from now on! Came for lunch
column2: and the plaza was already packed by 11AM! We had to circle and circle over and over just to get a spot. The wait time must tell you something
column3: for the restaurant just opening and having to wait 20~ minutes just for a party of 2
column4: must mean it's popular and worth coming to!
